en-us.Content: Microsoft 365 Apps may not install or run correctly on older systems, please [visit our docs](https://otp.landian.vip/help/?ref=out-of-ms-support) for more information.

zh-cn.Content: Microsoft 365 应用可能无法在老旧的系统上安装或运行，请[查看此处](https://otp.landian.vip/help/?ref=out-of-ms-support)了解更多信息。
